Components: Select

  • Overview

    This component decorate html select node.

    Embedded Modules

    • Params
    • Events
    • DataConfig

    Initialize

    new Com.Select(o);

    or

    Parameters

    container
    HTML Node. Component container that is required in case content is rendered without available select. Default: false.
    select
    HTML Node. Html select node. Default: cm.Node('select').
    renderInBody
    Boolean. Render dropdowns in document.body, else they will be rendrered in component container. Default: true.
    multiple
    Boolean. Render multiple select. Default: false.
    showTitleTag
    Boolean. Copy title from available select node to component container. Will be shown on hover. Default: true.
    title
    String. Title text. Will be shown on hover. Default: false.
    placeholder
    String. Placeholder text. Default: empty.
    options
    Array. Listing of options, for rendering through java-script. Example: [{'value' : 'foo', 'text' : 'Bar'}].
    selected
    String/Array. Id / array of selected items. Default: 0.
    disabled
    Boolean. Is select disabled. Default: false.
    events

    Object. Object of events. Available events: onSelect, onChange, onFocus, onBlur. Example:

    icons

    Object. Object of icons CSS class names.

    arrow
    String. Select arrow CSS class name. Default: icon default linked.

    Set parameters in html through data attribute

    Value in data attribute must be in JSON format. Example:

  • Get select by id:

    Com.GetSelect('id');

    Returns class of select component.

    Get selected option value:

    select.get();

    Returns selected option value, or array of values if select is multiple.

    Set active option:

    select.set(value);

    Set active option value, or array of values if select is multiple. Returns class of select component.

    Select all options:

    select.selectAll();

    Select all options in multiple select. Returns class of select component.

    Deselect all options:

    select.deselectAll();

    Deselect all options in multiple select. Returns class of select component.

    Set event:

    select.addEvent(event, handler);

    Available events: onSelect, onChange, onFocus, onBlur. Returns class of select component.

    Set events:

    select.addEvents(o);

    Example: {'onChange' : function(){}}. Available events: onSelect, onChange, onFocus, onBlur. Returns class of select component.

    Remove event:

    select.removeEvent(event, handler);

    Available events: onSelect, onChange, onFocus, onBlur. Returns class of select component.

    Trigger event:

    select.triggerEvent(event);

    Available events: onSelect, onChange, onFocus, onBlur. Returns class of select component.

    Add option:

    select.addOption(value, text);

    Returns class of select component.

    Add options:

    select.addOptions(arr);

    Example: [{'value' : 'foo', 'text' : 'Bar'}]. Returns class of select component.

    Edit option text:

    select.editOption(value, text);

    Returns class of select component.

    Remove option:

    select.removeOption(value);

    Returns class of select component.

    Remove all options:

    select.removeOptionAll();

    Returns class of select component.

    Get option:

    select.getOption(value);

    Returns option object.

    Get options:

    select.getOption(arr);

    Returns array of options.

    Get all options:

    select.getOptionsAll();

    Returns array of options.

    Disable:

    select.disable();

    Returns class of select component.

    Enable:

    select.enable();

    Returns class of select component.

    Get list of select nodes:

    select.getNodes(key);

    Returns object of nodes, or node if key is specified.
